titleStmt.title: The invisible world discovered to spirituall eyes and reduced to usefull meditation : in three books : also, the great mystery of godliness laid forth by way of affectuous and feeling meditation : with the apostolicall institution of imposition of hands for confirmation of children, setting forth the divine ground, end, and use of that too much neglected institution, and now published as an excellent expedient to truth and peace / by Jos. Hall.
titleStmt.author: Hall, Joseph, 1574-1656.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E. Cotes for John Place,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
